name: SaiPrashnavaliAndSaiYesNoAnswers
0:
”Alexa, open Sai Answers”
”Alexa, start Sai Answers”
”Alexa, launch Sai Answers”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sai answers
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Sai Answers by OmniSai.Org. Sai Baba said, "If you seek my advice and help, it shall be given to you at once. I shall be ever active and vigorous even after leaving this earthly body. I am ever living to help and guide all who come to me, who surrender to me and who seek refuge in me. If you seek my advice and help, it shall be given to you at once." It is a common practice for Sai devotees to Invoke Sai mentally and ask for guidance when needed. Sai Leela's are beyond human interpretations. Have full faith in Sai and he sure will help you. There are two formats, 1. Sai Prashnavali, a work published by Shri Madhav Lele for the benefit of Shri Sai's devotees seeking Baba's advice at difficult times and 2. Asking Sai for Yes No Answer

Sai Answers is part of our popular Shirdi Sai Baba All-In-One App that is available across all app stores and is by OmniSai.Org, a US 501(C)(3) Nonprofit Organization. We have App users / Site visitors from 150 countries, 49 states in USA, all 29 states in India and from ~3000 cities Worldwide. The most comprehensive Free "App / Resource For And by Sai Volunteers!". No Ads, No Hidden Agenda! We do not collect user data or monetize through any means. Simply experience the best! We intend to never advertise in our apps or on our website and intend to keep this service always FREE.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
